original_text: They and their buyer are to count the time from the year they sold themselves up to the Year of Jubilee. The price for their release is to be based on the rate paid to a hired worker for that number of years.
korean_text: 자기 몸이 팔린 해로부터 희년까지를 그 산 자와 계산하여 그 연수를 따라서 그 몸의 값을 정할 때에 그 사람을 섬긴 날을 그 사람에게 고용된 날로 여길 것이라

sentences.original_text: They and their buyer are to count the time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 구매자는 시간을 계산해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: from the year they sold themselves
up to the Year of Jubilee
is to be based on the rate
